name: svg-logo-maker
description: This SVG logo maker is a powerful command-line tool that empowers freelance web developers to effortlessly crate custom logos for theirs projects. With a user-friendly interface powered by Inquirer, developers can input up to three characters, choose text and shape colors and select from a variety of shapes including circles,triangles and squares. The application leverges Object-Oriented Programming(OOP) principles to efficiently generate SVG files named logo.svg, providing a seamless experience for developers.
